DOC.brief_summary: Eprotirome ( KB2115 ) liver selective thyroid hormone induce hyperthyroidism liver , euthyroid state preserve extrahepatic tissue . Eprotirome clinical 2-weeks study demonstrate pronounced reduction independent risk factor development atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease . The purpose study assess efficacy safety KB2115 monotherapy follow 12 week exposure compare placebo . The aim study ass efficacy ( LDL-cholesterol lower effect ) safety KB2115 .
DOC.brief_title: Eprotirome Treatment Dyslipidemia , Efficacy Safety 12-Week , Phase ii Study Assess Safety Efficacy KB2115 Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia
